data.title: Hello, Dolly! The Musical Tickets
data.meta_description: Book Hello, Dolly! tickets direct from The London Palladium Official Box Office from £20. Best choice of seats at the best price.
data.text:
★★★★★

‘A landmark theatrical production that will be talked about for years to come. Don’t miss it’ i News

Multi-Olivier and BAFTA Award-winning Imelda Staunton is back where she belongs in Hello, Dolly!

Now playing at The London Palladium, this five-star critically acclaimed new production re-unites Imelda with Director Dominic Cooke following Follies at the National Theatre. Joining Imelda are Andy Nyman, Jenna Russell, Tyrone Huntley, Harry Hepple and Emily Lane.

Meddlesome socialite turned matchmaker Dolly Levi travels to Yonkers, New York to find a match for the miserly, unmarried ‘half-a-millionaire’ Horace Vandergelder, but everything changes when she decides that the next match she needs to make is for herself.

With music and lyrics by the legendary Jerry Herman (La Cage aux Folles, Mack and Mabel, Mame) and book by Michael Stewart (42nd Street, Mack and Mabel, Barnum), Hello, Dolly! is one of the most iconic musicals of all time. Jerry Herman’s timeless score includes ‘Put On Your Sunday Clothes’, ‘Ribbons Down My Back’, ‘Before the Parade Passes By’, ‘Elegance’, ‘It Only Takes a Moment’ and of course, ‘Hello, Dolly!’

Don’t miss your chance to see this classic Broadway musical at The London Palladium for a strictly limited summer season until 14 September.

★★★★★ | Sunday Express

‘WOW, WOW, WOW fellas! Imelda Staunton is back where she belongs. ABSOLUTE BLISS’

★★★★★ | The Guardian

‘Beautifully life-affirming. Joyous!’

★★★★★ | Financial Times

‘Jenna Russell is magnificent’

★★★★★ | London Theatre

‘This roof-raising musical spectacular is the show of the year’

★★★★ | Independent

‘Dominic Cooke’s revival lights up the London Palladium’

★★★★ | The Telegraph

‘Imelda Staunton is back where she belongs. A performance that reaffirms her as one of British theatre’s greats’

★★★★ | Daily Mail

‘Imelda Staunton’s a 5 star Dolly. Stunning’

Hello, Dolly! Event Information

VENUE: The London Palladium, Argyll Street, London, W1F 7TF

TICKETS FROM: £20.00 – No fees.

All ticket prices include a £1.70 restoration levy

BOOK WITH CONFIDENCE: Best Seats, best availability, and no booking fees when you book direct.

ACCESS: For more information about access to The London Palladium, click here

GROUP BOOKINGS: Click here to find great group rates

RUNNING TIME: 2 hour 25 minutes including 20 minute interval

AGE RECOMMENDATION: No under 4s admitted.

Booster seats are not permitted on the Royal Circle and Grand Circle levels for health and safety reasons.

SHOW GENRE: Musicals

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION: Booster seats are not permitted on the Royal Circle and Grand Circle levels for health and safety reasons.

DISCLAIMER: Please note the producers cannot guarantee the appearance of any particular artist. The schedule is subject to change and may be affected by contracts, holidays, illness or events beyond the producers’ control.

FAQS: For any other questions, please visit our FAQs page. Enjoy your visit to our theatre.
